text: All of the spanish (es) server error messages are 'semi' translated or textually translated, which should not be the case. As far as I would say, translations for errors should be made such that the end user can understand what is going on. So I am submitting translations that do exactly that. HTTP_LENGTH_REQUIRED: Content-language: es Content-type: text/html Body:----------es-- Una solicitud con el método requiere que el contenido de la variable de los encabezados Content-Length sea válida. ----------es--
creator: alejandro@lay.com.mx
